message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a method for tracking the motion of a rigid body, which is a common problem in robotics (cs.RO) and computer vision (cs.CV). The method involves modeling the object state directly in the space of the rigid body motion group SE(2), which is a mathematical concept related to Lie groups (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the use of Kalman filters, which are a common tool in control systems and robotics (cs.SY), and the analysis of performance involves comparing the proposed method to other models, which is a common approach in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
